price: 200. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Samir yeesha oo ku sarreeya samir yeelashada, oo heegan ahaada sugan40, dhowrana (xilkuu idin saaray) Alle aad liibaantaane.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱصۡبِرُواْ وَصَابِرُواْ وَرَابِطُواْ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: 40. Idinkoo ku sugan rugahiinna oo ka ilaalinaya cadowga dhulka Islaamka, ama ku sugan masaajidda idinkoo sugaya salaadaha. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: Naari ma taabato labo indhood, il u oyday cabsi Alle iyo il u soo jeedday ilaalinta xuduudaha Muslimka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū iṣ'birū waṣābirū warābiṭū wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
